display_long_description:
# FLY high, DIVE fast and GLIDE free

Flap your hands like a bird to sweep across the skies in **the best flying game in VR**!

**Race together** in exciting environments with your **hands as wings**

[media]

**Hang out** and **compete** against other players **online**

[media]

**Glide** at your own pace or **race against time** in single-player

[media]

**Collect points** and **unlock new levels**

[media]

Conquer **leaderboards**, get new **tattoos and wings**

[media]

Let’s meet up in the land of **Exer**!


**Exer Gale Community** Discord https://discord.gg/hNVMRYdBNd
